text: Here’s a pretty cool little demo of GuidedTrack, a DSL for researchers and educators. IMO end-user friendly domain-specific languages as “applications” still have a lot of green space to be explored. I work on the onboarding for this language/IDE. <https://twitter.com/RobertHaisfield/status/1394772912322748416?s=20>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/RobertHaisfield|@RobertHaisfield>: A workout timer template in <https://twitter.com/GuidedTrack|@GuidedTrack>. Our equivalent of a "function" is the ability to call other programs. The program in the middle is calling the one on the right to show the workout title and amount of time left. Would also be a good opportunity to show *repeat and loops <https://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/E1s5xQZUcAE6rtq.jpg>
attachments.text: A workout timer template in <https://twitter.com/GuidedTrack|@GuidedTrack>. Our equivalent of a "function" is the ability to call other programs. The program in the middle is calling the one on the right to show the workout title and amount of time left. Would also be a good opportunity to show *repeat and loops
